curPatternObj.2: Step 1. Move the left foot to B forming a sitting stance toward D while extending the left fist to D horizontally.
curPatternObj.3: Step 2. Execute a middle punch to D with the right fist while maintaining a sitting stance toward D.
curPatternObj.4: Step 3. Execute a middle punch to D with the left fist while maintaining a sitting stance toward D. Perform 2 and 3 in a fast motion.
curPatternObj.5: Step 4. Bring the left foot to the right foot and then move the right foot to A forming a sitting stance toward D while extending the right fist to D horizontally.
curPatternObj.6: Step 5. Execute a middle punch to D with the left fist while maintaining a sitting stance toward D.
curPatternObj.7: Step 6. Execute a middle punch to D with the right fist while maintaining a sitting stance toward D. Perform 5 and 6 in a fast motion.
curPatternObj.8: Step 7. Move the right foot to AD forming a right walking stance toward AD while executing a middle side block to AD with the right inner forearm.
curPatternObj.9: Step 8. Execute a low front snap kick to AD with the left foot keeping the position of the hands as they were in 7.
curPatternObj.10: Step 9. Lower the left foot to AD forming a left walking stance toward AD while executing a middle punch to AD with the left fist.
curPatternObj.11: Step 10. Execute a middle punch to AD with the right fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward AD. Perform 9 and 10 in a fast motion.
curPatternObj.12: Step 11. Move the left foot to BD forming a left walking stance toward BD at the same time executing a middle side block to BD with the left inner forearm.
curPatternObj.13: Step 12. Execute a low front snap kick to BD with the right foot keeping the position of the hands as they were in 11.
curPatternObj.14: Step 13. Lower the right foot to BD forming a right walking stance toward BD while executing a middle punch to BD with the right fist.
curPatternObj.15: Step 14. Execute a middle punch to BD with the left fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward BD. Perform 13 and 14 in a fast motion.
curPatternObj.16: Step 15. Execute a middle hooking block to D with the right palm while forming a right walking stance toward D, pivoting with the left foot.
curPatternObj.17: Step 16. Execute a middle hooking block to D with the left palm while maintaining a right walking stance toward D.
curPatternObj.18: Step 17. Execute a middle punch to D with the right fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward D. Execute 16 and 17 in a connecting motion.
curPatternObj.19: Step 18. Move the left foot to D forming a left walking stance toward D while executing a middle hooking block to D with the left palm.
curPatternObj.20: Step 19. Execute a middle hooking block to D with the right palm while maintaining a left walking stance toward D.
curPatternObj.21: Step 20. Execute a middle punch to D with the left fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward D. Execute 19 and 20 in a connecting motion.
curPatternObj.22: Step 21. Move the right foot to D forming a right walking stance toward D at the same time executing a middle punch to D with the right fist.
curPatternObj.23: Step 22. Turn the face toward D forming a right bending ready stance A toward D.
curPatternObj.24: Step 23. Execute a middle side piercing kick to D with the left foot.
curPatternObj.25: Step 24. Lower the left foot to D forming a left walking stance toward D while striking the left palm with the right front elbow.
curPatternObj.26: Step 25. Turn the face toward C forming a left bending ready stance A toward C.
curPatternObj.27: Step 26. Execute a middle side piercing kick to C with the right foot.
curPatternObj.28: Step 27. Lower the right foot to C forming a right walking stance toward C while striking the right palm with the left front elbow.
curPatternObj.29: Step 28. Move the left foot to E forming a right L-stance toward E while executing a twin knife-hand block.
curPatternObj.30: Step 29. Move the right foot to E forming a right walking stance toward E while executing a middle thrust to E with the right straight finger tip.
curPatternObj.31: Step 30. Move the right foot to F turning clockwise to form a left L-stance toward F while executing a twin knife-hand block.
curPatternObj.32: Step 31. Move the left foot to F forming a left walking stance toward F while executing a middle thrust to F with the left straight finger tip.
curPatternObj.33: Step 32. Move the left foot to C forming a left walking stance toward C while executing a high side block to C with the left outer forearm.
curPatternObj.34: Step 33. Execute a middle punch to C with the right fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward C.
curPatternObj.35: Step 34. Move the right foot to C forming a right walking stance toward C while executing a high side block to C with the right outer forearm.
curPatternObj.36: Step 35. Execute a middle punch to C with the left fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward C.
curPatternObj.37: Step 36. Jump to C forming a left X-stance toward B while executing a high side strike to C with the left back fist.
curPatternObj.38: Step 37. Move the right foot to A forming a right walking stance toward A at the same time executing a high block to A with the right double forearm.
curPatternObj.39: Step 38. Bring the right foot to the left foot and then move the left foot to B forming a left walking stance toward B while executing a high block to B with the left double forearm.
curPatternObj.40: End: Bring the foot back to a ready position
curPatternObj.title: Yul-GokEdit
